alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:02PM EST until January 09 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 402 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clarendon to near Bluffton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Hilton Head Island, Bluffton, Beaufort, Port Royal, Clarendon, Lemon Island, Rose Hill, Shell Point, Burton, Calawassie Island, Laurel Bay, Hilton Head Airport, Ladys Island, Beaufort Marine Corps Air Station, and Parris Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure, such as a basement or small interior room.
